summary: This document outlines the terms and conditions of The Haze Trust, created by Jeffrey E. Epstein. It details the powers and responsibilities of the Trustee, including investment authority and the ability to designate additional Trustees. The document is significant as it provides insight into Epstein's financial arrangements and control over the Trust.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the Trustee of The Haze Trust and has the authority to manage the Trust's assets and designate additional Trustees.

persons.name: Dann K. Indyk
persons.context: Dann K. Indyk is designated by Jeffrey E. Epstein to act as a Trustee of The Haze Trust.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein designates Dann K. Indyk to act as a Trustee of The Haze Trust, indicating a formal relationship in the management of the Trust.

keyFacts: The Haze Trust was created by Jeffrey E. Epstein under a trust agreement dated February 9, 1999.
Jeffrey E. Epstein has the authority to manage the Trust's assets and designate additional Trustees.
The document outlines the powers of the Trustee, including investment authority and the ability to borrow money.
The Trust Agreement allows for the Trustee to act without court approval for many actions.
The Trust can be amended or revoked by Jeffrey E. Epstein during his lifetime.
